title: card.triangulate Response Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description: Response containing triangulated location information and triangulation settings.

motion.description: Time of last detected Notecard movement.

mode.description: A comma-separated list indicating the active triangulation modes.

on.description: `true` if triangulation scans will be performed even if the device has not moved.

usb.description: `true` if triangulation scans will be performed only when the device is USB-powered.

length.description: The length of the `text` buffer provided in the current or a previous request.

samples.title: Complete Triangulation Response
samples.description: Response showing full triangulation configuration and status information.

samples.title: Minimal Triangulation Response
samples.description: Response showing basic triangulation mode configuration.
